message.raw: Change pencil matrix storage to include sparsest-possible CSR versions for fast dot products, and expanded-sparsity CSC versions for fast LU decompositions.  Also change timesteppers to store and reuse LU decompositions when possible (based on timestep sizes).
message.html: Change pencil matrix storage to include sparsest-possible CSR versions for fast dot products, and expanded-sparsity CSC versions for fast LU decompositions. Also change timesteppers to store and reuse LU decompositions when possible (based on timestep sizes).
